[#surface-strew-size_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:plot-description:surface-strew-size:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soil surface strew size codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soil surface strew size codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

    |Controlled Shapes | The result value _MUST_ be from the following table
    |Iri | Label
    
    |https://linked.data.gov.au/def/test/dawe-cv/320d51bb-d184-5341-bc47-be8eb4824595 | Cobble (51-250mm)
    
    |https://linked.data.gov.au/def/test/dawe-cv/62f24913-4b82-53c5-9e26-b8c4eae5fd91 | Boulder (250mm +)
    
    |https://linked.data.gov.au/def/test/dawe-cv/977f7fbf-02c4-5cba-8b6d-f10bf7cf79eb | Pebble (5-50mm)
    
    |https://linked.data.gov.au/def/test/dawe-cv/abea0b0e-333b-574c-87db-cbf59ae11a20 | Not Collected
    

|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
